channel.title: Ask Command
channel.description: How do I make a command so people can do ::ask and it sends a message to just moderators?

item.title: Ask Command
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:9, topic:261171”][quote author=satesql link=topic=344896.msg2660291#msg2660291 date=1234136677]
Create an array list of the staff, this makes it more organized than looping everyone…
Just an example. don’t really use lol…

/*
if (command.startsWith("ask") && command.length() > 5) {
		ArrayList<String> Staff = new ArrayList<String>();
	
		command.substring(5).trim();
		String yName = playerName;
		yName=yName.toLowerCase();
       
                Staff.add("Staff name here..");
                } else  if (playerRights == 1) {
                PlayerHandler.messageToStaff= "[Staff] "+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
					}
                                   }
                           }
*/

[/quote]
I’m sorry, but that code looks horrible and it’s just a bad idea for certain reasons like the one X Blitz X pointed out.[/quote]

How does it look horrible?

Read full topic

item.title: Ask Command

item.description:

[quote=“satesql, post:1, topic:261187”]Create an array list of the staff, this makes it more organized than looping everyone…
Just an example. don’t really use lol…

[CODE]
/*
if (command.startsWith(“ask”) && command.length() > 5) {
ArrayList Staff = new ArrayList();

	command.substring(5).trim();
	String yName = playerName;
	yName=yName.toLowerCase();
   
            Staff.add("Staff name here..");
            } else  if (playerRights == 1) {
            PlayerHandler.messageToStaff= "[Staff] "+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
				}
                               }
                       }

*/
[/CODE][/quote]
I’m sorry, but that code looks horrible and it’s just a bad idea for certain reasons like the one X Blitz X pointed out.

item.title: Ask Command
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Why would you have that many mods lol? I’ve never been on a p server that has 50+ mods lol… This is a lot better, not to mention, instead of say having mods yell, what if there was a certain mod that got in trouble and lost his yell rights? Get my point?

Read full topic

item.title: Ask Command
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“satesql, post:1, topic:261187”]Create an array list of the staff, this makes it more organized than looping everyone…
Just an example. don’t really use lol…

[CODE]
/*
if (command.startsWith(“ask”) && command.length() > 5) {
ArrayList Staff = new ArrayList();

	command.substring(5).trim();
	String yName = playerName;
	yName=yName.toLowerCase();
   
            Staff.add("Staff name here..");
            } else  if (playerRights == 1) {
            PlayerHandler.messageToStaff= "[Staff] "+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
				}
                               }
                       }

*/
[/CODE][/quote]
Then you have to add everyone that’s a mod and admin manually, what happens if you have a VPS with like 500+ characters and 50 maybe 60 mods or admins?

Read full topic

item.title: Ask Command
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Do a for each loop though all the players.

for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
}

Check the player rights and send the message.

for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
    if(p == null) {
        return;    
    }
    if(p.playerRights > 1) {
        p.sendMessage("Message.");
    }     
}

Read full topic
